channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0251; 04:58AM; 8001 N Laurel Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NRQRZC; Sun Valley; KNOCKDOWN: 48 firefighters located, isolated and extinguished fire in the attic and fa√ßade of a two story strip mall in 30 minutes. There are no injuries reported. No further details.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 CM40 CM42 E239 E260 E289 E60 E77 E81 E89 EM14 RA77 RA889 RA89 T39 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0251; 04:28AM; 8001 N Laurel Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NRQRZC; Sun Valley; Two story strip mall with smoke showing upon LAFD arrival. Firefighters are in the offensive mode and determined an outside fire extended into the attic of the building.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 CM40 CM42 E239 E260 E289 E60 E77 E81 E89 EM14 RA77 RA889 RA89 T39 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - FATALITY; INC#1653; 10:03PM; 6400 N Woodley Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/2SNWUV8; Van Nuys; Two car collision with a total of six patients (ages estimated): 60yo female determined dead on scene, 3yo male grave condition, 28yo female/21yo female/30yo male/22yo male all transported in *at least* serious condition. Any further media questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 4755; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E100 E290 E39 E83 E90 EM14 EM15 EM17 RA100 RA73 RA88 RA90 RA93 T90; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - Multi-Casualty Incident; INC#1653; 09:35PM; 6400 N Woodley Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/2SNWUV8; Van Nuys; Collision (number of vehicles unknown at this time) with current count of 5 patients. Two patients are in grave condition: 3yo male, elderly (age unknown) female. Additional ambulances are enroute. LAPD Inc# 4755; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E100 E290 E90 EM14 EM15 EM17 RA100 RA73 RA88 RA90 RA93 T90; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue - Hoist Op; INC#1485; 07:23PM; 13100 Alta Vista Way; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JCJ4fy; Sylmar; Firefighters located an adult male mountain biker who sustained a fall and has lower extremity injury. Due to the location and injury, LAFD Air Operations is preparing for a hoist rescue. ; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E298 E91 H3 H4 HA3 HA4 RA91 RH114 T98; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0348; 07:51AM; 3012 S Brighton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/437oY45; Adams-Normandie; KNOCKDOWN: 28 firefighters extinguished the fire in 14 minutes with no injuries reported. The structure type is updated to a detached (not converted) garage. No further details.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E15 E215 E226 E26 RA15 RA815 T15 T26; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0348; 07:37AM; 3012 S Brighton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/437oY45; Adams-Normandie; Detached garage, converted garage with fire showing. There is one two-story home exposed. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. No additional resources required.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E15 E215 E226 E26 RA15 RA815 T15 T26; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - Multi-Casualty Incident; INC#0753; 12:57PM; 13200 N Sepulveda Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Nt8A89; Granada Hills; A total of six patients were evaluated and three were transported. Firefighters extricated one patient (50-60yo male) in critical condition. Two additional patients (ages/genders unknown) were transported in serious condition. Any further media questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 2034. No further details. ; FS 75; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AP7 BC12 BC15 E18 E275 E287 E98 EM12 EM14 EM15 HR3 RA18 RA39 RA807 RA81 RA87 RA89 RA891 RA898 RA91 T75 T87 UR88; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - Multi-Casualty Incident; INC#0753; 12:14PM; 13200 N Sepulveda Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Nt8A89; Granada Hills; Traffic collision (unknown number of vehicles) with preliminary report of six patients. One of the patients is trapped, requiring extrication. The condition of the patients is unknown at this time. LAPD Inc# 2034; FS 75; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E18 E275 E287 E98 EM15 HR3 RA18 RA898 RA91 T75 T87 UR88; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart

CONTAINED Brush Fire - CONTAINED; INC#0500; 10:39AM; 400 W Solano Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3r54xYc; Elysian Park; At 9:29AM LAFD responded to a reported brush fire in the area of Radio Hill. Firefighters located a small grass fire. While on scene, firefighters witnessed a male (age unknown) setting a fire. LAFD Arson (LAPD also responded) took the person into custody and are conducting a full investigation. There were no injuries reported and no structures damaged/threatened. No further details at this time. ; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AR12 AR17 AR25 AR30 BC1 BC2 E1 E2 E201 E202 E203 E4 E44 E9 E90 EM11 H2 H3 H4 HA2 HA3 HA4 PH1 RA1 T1 T2 T3; CH5; 12; Margaret Stewart
